## Query.find() method

> This API is provided as a beta preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Finds list of item from the IndexedDB

**Signature:**

```typescript
find(query?: QueryRootFilter, options?: QueryFindOptions): this;
```

</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

query

_(Optional)_ Search query object


</td></tr>

</td><td>

[QueryFindOptions](./iodm-query.queryfindoptions.md)


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ Query options


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

this


## Example


```ts
const query = new Query(idb, "store-name");
const data = await query.find({ $key: "text" });
```
